sourcesContent:
export const quiz4 =  {
  "quizTitle": "Section 4: Exotics",
  "quizSynopsis": "This is the real hard part - let's see how well you know your exotics.",

  "appLocale": {
    "landingHeaderText": "<questionLength> Exotic Perks",
    "question": "Perk",
    "startQuizBtn": "Try me.",
    "resultFilterAll": "All",
    "resultFilterCorrect": "Correct",
    "resultFilterIncorrect": "Incorrect",
    "nextQuestionBtn": "Next",
    "resultPageHeaderText": "You have completed this section. You got <correctIndexLength> out of <questionLength> questions.",
    "singleSelectionTagText": "Section 2",
    "pickNumberOfSelection": "Choose <numberOfSelection>",
  },

  "questions": [
    {
      "question": "Which exotic weapon does this perk belong to?",
      "questionType": "photo",
      "questionPic": "https://d2.destinygamewiki.com/mediawiki/images/b/bf/Vermin_icon.png",
      "answers": [
        "https://d2.destinygamewiki.com/mediawiki/images/7/7a/Two-tailed_fox_icon1.jpg",
        "https://d2.destinygamewiki.com/mediawiki/images/archive/c/c9/20190929154649%21Tarrabah_icon1.jpg",
        "https://d2.destinygamewiki.com/mediawiki/images/3/3e/Fighting_lion_icon1.png",
        "https://d2.destinygamewiki.com/mediawiki/images/9/91/Rat_king_icon1.png"
      ],
      "correctAnswer": "4",
      "messageForCorrectAnswer": "This is only here to satisfy a certain madman. It gets hard, so be ready.",
      "messageForIncorrectAnswer": "Rat King is a quest exotic that must be earned with a fireteam.",
      "explanation": "Perk - Vermin: Reloading immediately after a kill grants a brief period of invisibility.",
      "segment": "Easy",
      "segment2": "5 Points",
      "point": "5",
    },
    {
      "question": "Which exotic weapon does this perk belong to?",
      "questionType": "photo",
      "questionPic": "https://d2.destinygamewiki.com/mediawiki/images/d/d3/Accomplice_icon1.png",
      "answers": [
        "https://d2.destinygamewiki.com/mediawiki/images/7/7a/Two-tailed_fox_icon1.jpg",
        "https://d2.destinygamewiki.com/mediawiki/images/archive/c/c9/20190929154649%21Tarrabah_icon1.jpg",
        "https://d2.destinygamewiki.com/mediawiki/images/3/3e/Fighting_lion_icon1.png",
        "https://d2.destinygamewiki.com/mediawiki/images/9/91/Rat_king_icon1.png"
      ],
      "correctAnswer": "4",
      "messageForCorrectAnswer": "Sturm is such an underused weapon - it can two tap in PvP, you know!",
      "messageForIncorrectAnswer": "Sturm is an exotic hand cannon designed to be paired with Drang, a legendary sidearm.",
      "explanation": "Perk - Accomplice: Kills with this weapon fill the magazine of the equipped Energy weapon from reserves.",
      "segment": "Hard",
      "segment2": "20 Points",
      "point": "20",
    },
    {
      "question": "Which exotic weapon does this perk belong to?",
      "questionType": "photo",
      "questionPic": "https://d2.destinygamewiki.com/mediawiki/images/e/e2/Cold_fusion_icon1.png",
      "answers": [
        "https://d2.destinygamewiki.com/mediawiki/images/7/7a/Two-tailed_fox_icon1.jpg",
        "https://d2.destinygamewiki.com/mediawiki/images/archive/c/c9/20190929154649%21Tarrabah_icon1.jpg",
        "https://d2.destinygamewiki.com/mediawiki/images/3/3e/Fighting_lion_icon1.png",
        "https://d2.destinygamewiki.com/mediawiki/images/9/91/Rat_king_icon1.png"
      ],
      "correctAnswer": "4",
      "messageForCorrectAnswer": "Ah, another Year 1 veteran. The good old days of Calus are gone, unfortunately.",
      "messageForIncorrectAnswer": "Rat King is a quest exotic that must be earned with a fireteam.",
      "explanation": "Perk - Cold Fusion: This weapon shoots a steady cold fusion-powered laser.",
      "segment": "Easy",
      "segment2": "5 Points",
      "point": "5",
    },
    {
      "question": "Which exotic weapon does this perk belong to?",
      "questionType": "photo",
      "questionPic": "https://d2.destinygamewiki.com/mediawiki/images/b/bf/Vermin_icon.png",
      "answers": [
        "https://d2.destinygamewiki.com/mediawiki/images/7/7a/Two-tailed_fox_icon1.jpg",
        "https://d2.destinygamewiki.com/mediawiki/images/archive/c/c9/20190929154649%21Tarrabah_icon1.jpg",
        "https://d2.destinygamewiki.com/mediawiki/images/3/3e/Fighting_lion_icon1.png",
        "https://d2.destinygamewiki.com/mediawiki/images/9/91/Rat_king_icon1.png"
      ],
      "correctAnswer": "4",
      "messageForCorrectAnswer": "This is only here to satisfy a certain madman. It gets hard, so be ready.",
      "messageForIncorrectAnswer": "Rat King is a quest exotic that must be earned with a fireteam.",
      "explanation": "Perk - Vermin: Reloading immediately after a kill grants a brief period of invisibility.",
      "segment": "Easy",
      "segment2": "5 Points",
      "point": "5",
    },
  ]
}

export default quiz4;
